com.ragego.engine

Class Intersection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ragego.engine.Intersection

  • public class Intersection
extends java.lang.Object
    A coordinate on the GameBoard.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Intersection(int column, int line, GameBoard board)
      Create a representation of an Intersection with an attached board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Intersection

        protected Intersection(int column,
                       int line,
                       GameBoard board)
        Create a representation of an Intersection with an attached board.
        Parameters:
        column - Column associated : numbers from left to right
        line - Line associated : numbers from top to bottom
        board - Attached board

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static Intersection get(int column,
                               int line,
                               GameBoard board)
        Retrive an intersection. If the intersection has already been created, return it. Otherwise, create a new Intersection.
        Parameters:
        column - Column associated : numbers from left to right
        line - Line associated : numbers from top to bottom
        board - Attached board
        Returns:
        The representation of the intersection

      • get

        public static Intersection get(java.lang.String coordinate,
                               GameBoard board)
        Retrieve an intersection from a SGF format.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - Two letters string which represent the coordinate.
        board - Attached board
        Returns:
        Representation of the intersection

      • getColumn

        public int getColumn()
        The column associated with this intersection. Columns are numbers from left to right
        Returns:
        The associated column

      • getLine

        public int getLine()
        The line associated with this intersection. Lines are numbers from top to bottom
        Returns:
        The associated line

      • getBoard

        public GameBoard getBoard()
        The board where this intersection is.
        Returns:
        The associated board

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Compare Intersections. Object and this intersection are identical means that object is an Intersection and that column, line and board are identical.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - Intersection to compare
        Returns:
        true if they are identical.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • isAsideOf

        public boolean isAsideOf(Intersection position)
        Test if a position is neighbour to this one. A neighbour is a position on :
        • column less 1
        • column plus 1
        • line plus 1
        • line less 1

        This function has the same result for a.isAsideOf(b) and b.isAsideOf(a)

        Parameters:
        position - The position to test
        Returns:
        true if they are neighbours

      • getNeighboursIntersections

        public java.util.ArrayList<Intersection> getNeighboursIntersections()
        Get neighbours of this intersection.
        Returns:
        Array of intersection. The size depends of number of neighbours

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
